definition: (after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: Descended in part from Inca colonists sent here more than 500 years ago, the inhabitants of Taquile keep the old ways.
sentences.chinese: 部分居民是五百年前殖民者的後裔。

sentences.english: The colonists massacred thousands of natives with brutal and callous force.
sentences.chinese: 殖民者慘絕人寰地屠殺了成千的土著居民。
殖民者更深入地向內地發展。

sentences.english: Tradition says early safaris (settlers) ate pumpkin pie or something similar to it.
sentences.chinese: 傳說早期的殖民者聽南瓜餡餅或者是其它相似的東西。

sentences.english: By the middle of the 18th century, French colonialists set up base Diyou Ken fort.
sentences.chinese: 18世紀中葉，法國殖民者在此建立據點迪尤肯堡。

sentences.english: Some of the tribe attacked settlers working in the fields.
sentences.chinese: 一些部落會趁著開拓者在田野工作時，攻擊殖民者。

sentences.english: They must combat the colonists until victory was theirs.
sentences.chinese: 他們必須同殖民者戰鬥直到勝利屬於他們。
美洲的英國清教徒殖民者。

sentences.english: A short period of ten years, the colonists built in Qingdao, a large number of European-style architecture.
sentences.chinese: 短短十幾年間，殖民者在青島建造了大量歐式建築。

sentences.english: The Walton's colonialists here and there.
sentences.chinese: 到處都是沃爾頓的殖民者。

sentences.english: ATM . The starting large colonizer you have, you should colonize the best mining system around.
sentences.chinese: 出發大型殖民者你，你應該拓殖最佳挖掘系統靠近。

sentences.english: There are also recreated versions of the ships that carried the colonists to Jamestown Island.
sentences.chinese: 把殖民者帶到詹姆斯敦島的船也被重新造了出來。

sentences.english: The Indians often attacked the settlements of the colonist.
sentences.chinese: 印地安人經常襲擊殖民者的定居點。

sentences.english: The settlers were enclosing land and engaged in wars with the Native Americans.
sentences.chinese: 殖民者在圈地，並挑起了與印第安人的戰爭。

sentences.english: Just a few meters ahead, you run into a colonist who warns you not to go up the road.
sentences.chinese: 走了幾米有一個殖民者會過來警告你別繼續向前。

sentences.english: To the former Belgian colonizers, Rwanda was a paradise.
sentences.chinese: 對於以前的比利時殖民者來說，盧旺達就是個天堂。

definition: Tsarist Russia/abbr. for 沙皇俄國|沙皇俄国[Sha1 huang2 E2 guo2]
the Americas/North and South American continents
